display_html:
class Typeable h ⇒ HashAlgorithm h where
  • byteCount ∷ proxy h → Natural
  • digest ∷ HasCallStack ⇒ proxy h → ByteString → ByteString
name: HashAlgorithm digest byteCount

display_html:
newtype Hash h a = UnsafeHash {
  • getHash ∷ ByteString
}
name: Hash UnsafeHash getHash

display_html: hash ∷ ∀ h a. (HashAlgorithm h, ToCBOR a) ⇒ a → Hash h a
name: hash

display_html: hashPair ∷ ∀ h a b c. HashAlgorithm h ⇒ Hash h a → Hash h b → Hash h c
name: hashPair

display_html: hashWithSerialiser ∷ ∀ h a. HashAlgorithm h ⇒ (a → Encoding) → a → Hash h a
name: hashWithSerialiser

display_html: xor ∷ Hash h a → Hash h a → Hash h a
name: xor

display_html:
class (Typeable v, Show (VerKeyKES v), Eq (VerKeyKES v), Show (SignKeyKES v), Show (SigKES v), Eq (SigKES v), NoUnexpectedThunks (SigKES v), NoUnexpectedThunks (SignKeyKES v), NoUnexpectedThunks (VerKeyKES v)) ⇒ KESAlgorithm v where
  • data VerKeyKES v ∷ Type
  • data SignKeyKES v ∷ Type
  • data SigKES v ∷ Type
  • type Signable v ∷ Type → Constraint
  • type ContextKES v ∷ Type
  • encodeVerKeyKES ∷ VerKeyKES v → Encoding
  • encodeSignKeyKES ∷ SignKeyKES v → Encoding
  • encodeSigKES ∷ SigKES v → Encoding
  • decodeVerKeyKES ∷ Decoder s (VerKeyKES v)
  • decodeSignKeyKES ∷ Decoder s (SignKeyKES v)
  • decodeSigKES ∷ Decoder s (SigKES v)
  • genKeyKES ∷ MonadRandom m ⇒ Natural → m (SignKeyKES v)
  • deriveVerKeyKES ∷ SignKeyKES v → VerKeyKES v
  • updateKES ∷ (MonadRandom m, HasCallStack) ⇒ ContextKES v → SignKeyKES v → Natural → m (Maybe (SignKeyKES v))
  • signKES ∷ (MonadRandom m, Signable v a, HasCallStack) ⇒ ContextKES v → Natural → a → SignKeyKES v → m (Maybe (SigKES v))
  • verifyKES ∷ (Signable v a, HasCallStack) ⇒ ContextKES v → VerKeyKES v → Natural → a → SigKES v → Either String ()
  • currentPeriodKES ∷ HasCallStack ⇒ ContextKES v → SignKeyKES v → Natural
name: KESAlgorithm VerKeyKES SignKeyKES SigKES Signable ContextKES encodeVerKeyKES encodeSignKeyKES encodeSigKES decodeVerKeyKES decodeSignKeyKES decodeSigKES genKeyKES deriveVerKeyKES updateKES signKES verifyKES currentPeriodKES

display_html:
newtype SignedKES v a = SignedKES {
  • getSig ∷ SigKES v
}
name: SignedKES SignedKES getSig

display_html: signedKES ∷ (KESAlgorithm v, MonadRandom m, Signable v a) ⇒ ContextKES v → Natural → a → SignKeyKES v → m (Maybe (SignedKES v a))
name: signedKES

display_html: verifySignedKES ∷ (KESAlgorithm v, Signable v a) ⇒ ContextKES v → VerKeyKES v → Natural → a → SignedKES v a → Either String ()
name: verifySignedKES

display_html:
class (Typeable v, Show (VerKeyDSIGN v), Eq (VerKeyDSIGN v), Show (SignKeyDSIGN v), Show (SigDSIGN v), Eq (SigDSIGN v), NoUnexpectedThunks (SigDSIGN v), NoUnexpectedThunks (SignKeyDSIGN v), NoUnexpectedThunks (VerKeyDSIGN v)) ⇒ DSIGNAlgorithm v where
  • data VerKeyDSIGN v ∷ Type
  • data SignKeyDSIGN v ∷ Type
  • data SigDSIGN v ∷ Type
  • type Signable v ∷ Type → Constraint
  • type ContextDSIGN v ∷ Type
  • abstractSizeVKey ∷ proxy v → Natural
  • abstractSizeSig ∷ proxy v → Natural
  • encodeVerKeyDSIGN ∷ VerKeyDSIGN v → Encoding
  • encodeSignKeyDSIGN ∷ SignKeyDSIGN v → Encoding
  • encodeSigDSIGN ∷ SigDSIGN v → Encoding
  • decodeVerKeyDSIGN ∷ Decoder s (VerKeyDSIGN v)
  • decodeSignKeyDSIGN ∷ Decoder s (SignKeyDSIGN v)
  • decodeSigDSIGN ∷ Decoder s (SigDSIGN v)
  • genKeyDSIGN ∷ MonadRandom m ⇒ m (SignKeyDSIGN v)
  • deriveVerKeyDSIGN ∷ SignKeyDSIGN v → VerKeyDSIGN v
  • signDSIGN ∷ (MonadRandom m, Signable v a, HasCallStack) ⇒ ContextDSIGN v → a → SignKeyDSIGN v → m (SigDSIGN v)
  • verifyDSIGN ∷ (Signable v a, HasCallStack) ⇒ ContextDSIGN v → VerKeyDSIGN v → a → SigDSIGN v → Either String ()
name: DSIGNAlgorithm SigDSIGN SignKeyDSIGN VerKeyDSIGN Signable ContextDSIGN abstractSizeVKey abstractSizeSig encodeVerKeyDSIGN encodeSignKeyDSIGN encodeSigDSIGN decodeVerKeyDSIGN decodeSignKeyDSIGN decodeSigDSIGN genKeyDSIGN deriveVerKeyDSIGN signDSIGN verifyDSIGN

display_html: newtype SignedDSIGN v a = SignedDSIGN (SigDSIGN v)
name: SignedDSIGN SignedDSIGN

display_html: signedDSIGN ∷ (DSIGNAlgorithm v, MonadRandom m, Signable v a) ⇒ ContextDSIGN v → a → SignKeyDSIGN v → m (SignedDSIGN v a)
name: signedDSIGN

display_html: verifySignedDSIGN ∷ (DSIGNAlgorithm v, Signable v a, HasCallStack) ⇒ ContextDSIGN v → VerKeyDSIGN v → a → SignedDSIGN v a → Either String ()
name: verifySignedDSIGN

display_html:
class (Typeable v, Show (VerKeyVRF v), Eq (VerKeyVRF v), Show (SignKeyVRF v), Show (CertVRF v), Eq (CertVRF v), FromCBOR (CertVRF v), ToCBOR (CertVRF v), NoUnexpectedThunks (CertVRF v), NoUnexpectedThunks (VerKeyVRF v), NoUnexpectedThunks (SignKeyVRF v)) ⇒ VRFAlgorithm v where
  • type Signable v ∷ Type → Constraint
  • type ContextVRF v ∷ Type
  • data VerKeyVRF v ∷ Type
  • data SignKeyVRF v ∷ Type
  • data CertVRF v ∷ Type
  • maxVRF ∷ proxy v → Natural
  • genKeyVRF ∷ MonadRandom m ⇒ m (SignKeyVRF v)
  • deriveVerKeyVRF ∷ SignKeyVRF v → VerKeyVRF v
  • decodeVerKeyVRF ∷ Decoder s (VerKeyVRF v)
  • encodeVerKeyVRF ∷ VerKeyVRF v → Encoding
  • evalVRF ∷ (MonadRandom m, HasCallStack, Signable v a) ⇒ ContextVRF v → a → SignKeyVRF v → m (Natural, CertVRF v)
  • verifyVRF ∷ (HasCallStack, Signable v a) ⇒ ContextVRF v → VerKeyVRF v → a → (Natural, CertVRF v) → Bool
name: VRFAlgorithm VerKeyVRF SignKeyVRF CertVRF Signable ContextVRF maxVRF genKeyVRF deriveVerKeyVRF decodeVerKeyVRF encodeVerKeyVRF evalVRF verifyVRF

display_html:
data CertifiedVRF v a = CertifiedVRF {
  • certifiedNatural ∷ Natural
  • certifiedProof ∷ CertVRF v
}
name: CertifiedVRF CertifiedVRF certifiedNatural certifiedProof

display_html: evalCertified ∷ (VRFAlgorithm v, MonadRandom m, Signable v a) ⇒ ContextVRF v → a → SignKeyVRF v → m (CertifiedVRF v a)
name: evalCertified

display_html: verifyCertified ∷ (VRFAlgorithm v, Signable v a) ⇒ ContextVRF v → VerKeyVRF v → a → CertifiedVRF v a → Bool
name: verifyCertified
